headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KORNREICH, STANLEY B.

snippet: KORNREICH--Stanley B.,died at home March 26. With his warmth, curiosity and humor, he had a unique ability to relate to people from all walks of life. Loving husband, father, grandfather, uncle and friend. Survived by his wife, Rhoda, daughters Eva and Louise, and grandson, Andre. Memorial service 3pm, April 17, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, NYC. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KORNREICH--Stanley B.,died at home March 26. With his warmth, curiosity and humor, he had a unique ability to relate to people from all walks of life.
